website_summaries.verdict: The top-seated motor gives this chopper serious slicing power.
pros: Four-cup chopping bowl with built-in measuring scale
Safety system ensures chopper won't start if notches aren't aligned
Motor on top of the chopper instead of below ensures powerful cutting
cons: Chopping bowl sides are ridged, which makes food hard to remove

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my nana and she loves it. She didn't want a bulky chopper but the one she had was just too small. It was really a coffee grinder; you couldn't even get a big onion in it. This is the perfect middle ground and just right, it works like a charm and she uses it all the time- I am very happy with this chopper and I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: lightweight  food processor
customer_reviews.text: had cabbage and onions and bell pepper and garlic i chopped today for the first time. yes this is a bit loud and certainly wouldnt use in my apartment at 6 in the morning. its also quite a nice big size and VERY POWERFUL. in fact i think its like my 5 cup heavy food processor. didnt have any carrot or raw potatoes but the cabbage came out almost pureed and that is using pulse judiciously. i think this chopper would be great to puree cooked beans to make a great thick soup or for baby food or salsas.. all in all good deal and good price.
customer_reviews.author: His Royal Heinie Spider

customer_reviews.title: One of My Favorite Countertop Appliances!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this chopper, I was afraid it might be just a bit too small for us; however, when it arrived, I found it to be just the right size. Needless to say, I love it. Onions can be chopped with only 3-4 short pulses. This is a lot better than watery-eyed chopping with a knife that could just as easily chop your fingers off, if you aren't concentrating on what you are doing. I chopped ham in it and it did marvelously. No need to worry. I know you will love this chopper, as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Works well but be careful not to let the motor ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well but be careful not to let the motor go for very long. This could overheat and break the motor. It's simple to use and not so hard to push the button at the top.
customer_reviews.author: elleinn

customer_reviews.title: Don't use it for hard items
customer_reviews.text: Had it for two months. At first I only use it to chop soft and semi hard foods. Work fine untill one day I use it to chop ginger.it burns the motor . So only buy it for soft items
customer_reviews.author: Garmand

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm pretty pleased with this chopper. It does a great job chopping herbs especially, and it's great for onions, carrots, celery, etc. I haven't tried it with cooked meat (i.e., chicken). Couple drawbacks: There are grooves in the hopper that catch food -- not a big deal, but somewhat inconvenient. The cord is a little awkward to store. Doesn't work great with quite small amounts. But overall, I think this is a time saver and a fun, cool-looking little machine. Also overall quite easy to clean, despite the comment abobe about the grooves. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David Foe

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a great price point.
customer_reviews.text: While this was actually purchased as a gift for a friend of mine, I've received plenty of feedback about it... enough that I feel comfortable with writing this review. According to my friend, the chopper works great and is very easy to use. It's also very easy to clean up, and it takes very little storage space (which was important for her.) We both feel it deserves recommendation. This is a relatively simple device... not a fancy tool for multiple uses. It's designed to chop and was specifically purchased to mince onions, and it does that well.
customer_reviews.author: Duane A. Priest

customer_reviews.title: My Must Have Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth purchase of this specific item. I found my first one in Florida and used it to slightly chop my ryo cigs tobacco. Great Job! Then I found that it chops my cabbage exactly right for my southern style hot dog slaw which all my family loves. Then my family wanted to have it for themselves and I bought two more. I bought my own second one after forgetting to pack and bring mine from FL to NC. Gotta have it! Easy to use, easy to clean. So far I have found it to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Chinquapin

customer_reviews.title: Chops vegetables well
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I used it to make my dog food and to chop vegetables. It chops things perfectly. This is my second one. Looks like it lasts about a year with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: SUNSHINE

customer_reviews.title: A really great chopper.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Will chop hard stuff. Very fast. Easy to clean. I use it far more often than my big Hamilton Beach blender. Makes tuna or salmon with mayo for sandwiches. Grinds meat with gravy for a wonderful meat paste for sandwiches. Easy to lift the lid and add ingredients. For the price is amazing. Highly recommend this 4 cup chopper.
customer_reviews.author: oldbrit

customer_reviews.title: Best food chopper ever
customer_reviews.text: Just love the fact that it is small. I'm a single person and I love to make salsa and guacomole. This little chopper (which holds 4 cups) is perfect. Very sharp blades and chops the tomatoes perfectly. No more crying over onions either. I looked at a lot of choppers, but I really liked the compact design of this model. You could easily keep it on your counter top if you use it a lot, or store it away in a deep drawer. It's amazing to me what a good design does for a product. I'd give this 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: GirlFriday715

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized chopper to save you time!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Using this is so much more efficient than using a manual (slap-chop type) chopper! Easy to use, easy to clean. The product comes in 3 pieces: the clear plastic bowl, the clear plastic cover, the blade that sits in the bowl, and the round red knob on top. The cord connects to the knob, and the blade pulses when you press the bottom on the top of the knob. It's also a great size for me. Plenty of room for average chopping needs yet small enough that it's easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Jexoteric

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chop
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. Just a chopper, and it does it job well. It will cut up an onion in seconds. For the price you cannot beat it. Hopefully it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great for family
customer_reviews.text: The item itself works well, as all Oster products do. However, it is really too large a cup for one person and I'm thinking of passing it to my grandsons. I ordered it thinking that the processor which fits on the blender was no longer available. When I couldn't get parts (after 20 plus years of use) i purchased this item in haste. Finally , I found their new processor which was advertised as fitting most blenders, and promptly ordered it. This one is fine for a couple or a family. .
customer_reviews.author: Rose M. Valente

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Oster!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It makes very short work of an onion, is easy to work with and clean up, and doesn't take much storage space. Like others have mentioned, the design of the device keeps it extra clean because the hole where the spinner interfaces with the motor is separated from the food chopping chamber -- smart design.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Replacement was easy, works good so far
customer_reviews.text: I love the chopper and would like to give it 5 stars but I can't, since I had to return my first one because it died after using it only a few times. I asked for a replacement, amazon sent me a new one promptly, and it works fine so far. Hopefully it will keep working. If it does, I'll change my review to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Zsuzsanna

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to everyone who answered my questions about this "gadget." While it doesn't puree as well as I'd hoped it chops like a champion! Looking forward to cold slaw and "Sunshine (carrot) Salad" among other things. Thanks again everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such an amazing little machine
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing little machine! Makes chopped salad in a flash, chops chunks of veggies rice-grain size for quick soups, and almost instantly purées fruit for jam. Easy to clean and small enough to sit on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Roth

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I have put the bit bulky food processor away and now use this for my chopping purposes. It is great to chop anything very fine--for salsas, soups, meatloaf, and for nuts ito use in salads or cookies. This has a lot of power for a little guy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: its great making sauces and guacamole A BIG TIME SAVER we ...
customer_reviews.text: we just lobe our Oster, its great making sauces and guacamole A BIG TIME SAVER we highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M. Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Great little chopper.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little chopper. Super powerful. Not great for onions unless you really watch how you use it. It can liquify them quickly. I like how small it is, as I have a small kitchen, and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Irishactivist

customer_reviews.title: Oster FPSTMC1250 Top Chop 4-Cup Chopper
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love it! Love it! I use it every day. It is excellent for chopping just about anything, and almost manual in that you can control the degree of chopping because you do use your hands with it. Great item and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: nancy m schiffman

customer_reviews.title: No doubt initially my wife liked it very much but later she started having problem ...
customer_reviews.text: No doubt initially my wife liked it very much but later she started having problem with the heavy head on the top and now it stopped working and we cannot even return it as it has exceeded the days of return policy. she is very upset with it.
customer_reviews.author: Raman

customer_reviews.title: Best Chopper!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best chopper!! It chops anything and everything and quickly!! I can throw a lot in it and add to it! This is one of my favorite kitchen gadgets!!
customer_reviews.author: willow

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Second unit. First one the blades started hitting the side after 1 week. Second one starting to do the same. Might be good for soft things but not carrots, onions or garlic.
customer_reviews.author: BBS

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it. After 2 uses, the motor stopped working. Very disappointed. When it worked, it worked well, though. I liked the larger size of the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon SuperReviewr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bargain for a Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I've put this thing through hell and back and five years later, it still works like a charm. Try not to put the it in the dishwasher as the heat can crack the plastic around the center pin that the blade sits on. But even slightly cracked, it doesn't leak and I use it every day for anything from smoothies to sauces to spice grinding. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Haile

customer_reviews.title: Hard To Use!
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to get the top part on correctly in order for the chopper to work. By the time I get it to chop I have lost interest in eating, drinking or cooking..I just wanna cuss!
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It works great for chopping vegetables and fruits, that's all I tried. But it does a fantastic job in a matter of seconds. Very easy to use and to wash. It is also a good size, I can fit in it quite a lot. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Anita P.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I use the chopper ALL THE TIME!!! It is my first and I don't know why I didn't get one sooner! It is quick, easy, and gets the job done perfectly! Chops pretty much anything from tomatoes to carrots wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Alysia McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best food processor I have ever used. Much better than the more expensive competition.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: This is my Favorite Chopper, I have a few choppers and this one out does them all. Perfect chopping every time.
customer_reviews.author: tammy bencivenga

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived broken. Shipping was late. The box was open and the product was broken. Bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: Rosse A.

customer_reviews.title: Handy-Dandy
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this little gadget I am making all my own fresh salad dressings. Doesn't take up much room, a snap to clean and does a great job. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dinty

customer_reviews.title: I used this briefly for my son when he was ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this briefly for my son when he was ready to move beyond purees, but not yet ready for whole foods. It works well for what it is, but I didn'y use it for long.
customer_reviews.author: smcomeau

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it, we had another brand and it broke after a couple of years. Saw this decided to try it. Glad we did.
customer_reviews.author: Steve A. Chambers Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Previous chopper I had was a glass bowl, this one plastic but still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: mesaros

customer_reviews.title: Great little chopper!
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 kids, so the standard 2 cup choppers are a bit small for us. This is a neat size for us plus we love the design. The pulsing thing works well, so we can have chunky salsa instead of salsa puree!
customer_reviews.author: charlikae

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Was D.O.A out of the box. Returned it and purchased a Kitchen Aid Food Chopper.
customer_reviews.author: nurset

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chopper for the main reason to chop meat to make home made dog food. It does the job consistently in seconds! Easy to work, easy easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: I've tried everything but no go what a waste!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this chopper once and cannot get it to chop. I've tried everything but no go what a waste!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dickie A. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver!
customer_reviews.text: So convenient! Blade sharpness is amazing. Holds 4 cups & chops almost anything perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Stiver

customer_reviews.title: ... I haven't tried it But it appears to be sturdy, and of good quality
customer_reviews.text: I gave as a gift so I haven't tried it But it appears to be sturdy, and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: glauzie

customer_reviews.title: Great for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: I use this for everything. I make homemade ketchup, chop of my veggies, and puree. Great for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lingle

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: For such a compact chopper this one does as well as some of the bigger and expensive ones. I love the way it is so easy to clean. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jntqnn

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to chop onions for me and this baby is doing it all right.
customer_reviews.author: siavash

customer_reviews.title: I love this because it doesn't have 12 different attachments like ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this because it doesn't have 12 different attachments like my other one. I have never purchased an Oster product and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Ragin

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Use it to make salad dressings, smoothies, and Israeli salads!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey S

customer_reviews.title: Love this chopper
customer_reviews.text: I can shop up salad items in seconds without effort! It chops carrots, almonds, apples, etc. very nicely without turning them into puree!
customer_reviews.author: gwg

customer_reviews.title: works very well in chopping up my veggies.. ...
customer_reviews.text: works very well in chopping up my veggies...but do have to be careful that you don't press the button too long...on my first try, i ended up w/ mushy chopped onions!...oh well!!...live and learn!
customer_reviews.author: poky

customer_reviews.title: This chopper is junk for firmer foods
customer_reviews.text: Bought based on good reviews. It is in fact a poorly constructed product. The drive motor is pathetically weak. Yes it could chop soft foods just fine, but pre-cut 1" chunks of cheese?--Forget it. After jamming in the cheese just a couple of times, the excessively loud motor failed to engage the cutter head. It is going into the trash today since it is beyond the return period. I'm amazed this cheap product is still on the market. My previous smaller Oster chopper lasted more than 20 years of regular use--mostly for cutting blocks of cheese! Obviously Oster no longer the quality brand it used to be. I'll be spending more and hopefully find something of quality--with a cheese-tested certification.
customer_reviews.author: Kris L. Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 18 months before falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Ours bit the dust 6 months after the warranty expired. It did a good job of chopping until then but I think should have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my needs. Not only does it work well but given the motor is on top, it saves me a lot of space compared to having one of the larger food processors. Even models that hold the same amount of food take up a lot of space due to the size of the main body. My only issue are the lines inside the bowl. It makes scooping or scraping out the food a bit more time-consuming that it would be without them. Otherwise a very good item.
customer_reviews.author: LeiCiel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Chopper!
customer_reviews.text: Super chopper...I needed to graguate from my one cupper! :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little chopper. It gets the job done easily and is a breeze to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Long

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Works fast and perfectly with the easiest clean up ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryn Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had gone with a more conventional, small chopper.
customer_reviews.author: Renemay

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the one I had
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a powerful little chopper. Way better than the one I had.
customer_reviews.author: CBS

customer_reviews.title: CAUGHT ON FIRE. 6 months of infrequent use, ...
customer_reviews.text: CAUGHT ON FIRE. 6 months of infrequent use, and it caught on fire while chopping onions.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best Chopper on Market
customer_reviews.text: Best chopper I have ever own. Easy to assemble, easy to clean, short pulses chops quickly and efficiently!! What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Cathey H. Drye

customer_reviews.title: very good chopper.
customer_reviews.text: very good chopper... this is the one I'm looking for. fast and chop till fine... good one. recommended to those finding a good electric chopper.
customer_reviews.author: Ong Liying

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking a bit easier!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these. Gave one to my brother and one to mom. THis works really well! Cuts prep time considerably. I made soup with this and it chopped everything in seconds. Makes the vegetable a little smaller than I would have cut them for soup but that is a small price to pay. I cut onions, celery, carrots, parsnips, squash and turnips in a jiffy. I would recommend. nice size!
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Pearlman

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product! Lot of noise and no chopping
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product! Lot of noise and no chopping!!! Would not even chop one slice of cubed bread!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Lowery

customer_reviews.title: The chopper arrived as scheduled. It serves very well ...
customer_reviews.text: The chopper arrived as scheduled. It serves very well for chopping onions, garlic, ginger and any spices. You can pulse it to any coarseness you want.
customer_reviews.author: Anahita

customer_reviews.title: don't expect power
customer_reviews.text: The oster mini chop that sits on my blender is no longer made so I had to choose something else. I attemped to chop up cheddar cheese for mac&cheese. Boy did that bog it down! I had diced the cheese first but the blade&motor couldn't handle it. I will use it for light weight items:herbs etc. Also the design is ugly.
customer_reviews.author: JHY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great little chopper for its size. Love it and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lininger

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: it just takes a little time lining it up so it will chop otherwise great
customer_reviews.author: lynda milutin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chopper
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, sturdy with nice looks. Chops well, easy to clean. Only one speed option, but it doesnt matter. Good job oster !!
customer_reviews.author: Rabeea Zaki

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect chopper, do recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Order received promptly, just as described. This is a perfect chopper, do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauralee Uberroth

customer_reviews.title: Chops great, but
customer_reviews.text: This little machine does a very good job but it is very hard to line up the top cover/motor,so it will work.
customer_reviews.author: S. Longiaru

customer_reviews.title: very well designed
customer_reviews.text: Great food chopper, it is well designed with the powerful motor on top, great capacity and good shape. Easy to handle, open and load with very wide top.
customer_reviews.author: billioned

customer_reviews.title: More of a shredder than a chopper.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this chopper because it turned everything to mush rather than dicing it or chopping it into nice small, intact pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This product is only 3 months old and quit working ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is only 3 months old and quit working. I have no recourse but to be out of the money I spent
customer_reviews.author: mary reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Have to send back does not work. But to ...
customer_reviews.text: Have to send back does not work . But to tell you the top is hard to handle for a average woman hands and it you have any thing wrong with your hand this is not for you . The top the motor is heavy and to large. Other then that did not get a chance to use.
customer_reviews.author: Its Bad

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use. Purchased a ninja chopper which is very easy to use and clean. Use it to chop cooked chicken and vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil Janowitch

customer_reviews.title: sorry don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I only use this chopper 1 time I went to use it and it would not work at all it's a sorry piece of junk I was so mad because this is brand new. always do your homework before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Better design than most food processors
customer_reviews.text: While I have an Oster blender with a food processing attachment and other attachments, this dedicated chopper is so much easier to use and clean. I used it to make graham cracker crumbs for a crust, and it worked beautifully. I like that the heavy motor sits on top, no need to twist the lid in place for use, and when you scrape out the processed food, you only have the lightweight bowl to deal with, no twisting that off a base either. Just lift out the blade, which is also easy to clean. This is a new favorite kitchen gadget.
customer_reviews.author: L. Burik

customer_reviews.title: So Many Uses, Good Size, Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chopper instead of getting a larger more expensive kitchen aid food processer like I wanted. However, this has been sooo useful. It's a good size. I use it for all sorts of things from mincing garlic to chopping up cauliflower to make it a rice texture. The 4 cups size makes it perfect for everyday use. It's easy to clean and only has 4 pieces to deal with (bowl, lid, blade, and the red top). When the red part is not attached to the lid it won't run so you don't have to worry about it getting hit and start spinning. I love this chopper.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lawshe

customer_reviews.title: Good but limited
customer_reviews.text: It does everything I need it for. But, if the amount of food is too little, it will quickly stick to the side, which makes it useless for small amounts of food. If it's too full, or the food is too heavy, it won't work. I do like it can take about 4 cups, if it's the right food. For me it's better than smaller ones that might have a better ratting. You need to think about what you will use it for. To chop a small amount, this may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: Did not work but ONE time!
customer_reviews.text: Used it one time at Christmastime; the next time I went to use it, it would not do one single thing. It seemed to not be getting any electricity to it. VERY disappointed that it did not last any longer than that!!!
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best food chopper I've ever owned since my Oster food chopper of 30 years finally gave up the ghost. I can't think of anything negative about this little chopper. Perfect size for smoothies, veggies, etc. Powerful little devil. And it takes up very little room in my cupboard. Cleans up easily. There is a knack to getting the top on - but once you figure that out (you have to to line up two little arrows) - you're good to go! I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Tri Cia

customer_reviews.title: This chopper is so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: In a world where name-brands mean little anymore, the name of Oster promises quality. This chopper is so easy to use, and cleaning is a snap. Unlike the Black and Decker chopper (which I threw out) wherein one had to be muscle-bound to open and close the device, this beauty just slides open and shut. Besides all the kudos above, it's actually attractive in the candy apple red. Best deal around.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: It chops a little too fine for me and there's no control on how "chopped" ...
customer_reviews.text: It chops a little too fine for me and there's no control on how "chopped" anything is unless you do your food in very small batches. I've actually been using it to sort of puree things for sauces because it goes that fine when chopping if you're not careful. If you want something that can be more reliable on what type of cuts it makes spend the few extra bucks for one with better controls. This isn't an awful product but I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: HungrySumo

customer_reviews.title: Great Chopper
customer_reviews.text: My previous chopper died without warning. I read the reviews until I finally found one that said this item chops nuts. Yes it does chop nuts and it does it quickly. Depending on how finely chopped you want them, it is done in no more than 4 pulses. Personally, I don't want my nuts real fine. I want that crunch when I'm eating an oatmeal cookie, a brownie, coffee cake, etc. I am absolutely delighted with the product.
customer_reviews.author: RCC

customer_reviews.title: food chopper
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a food processor or chopper but I seen this and had to have it. It works great I love it. It make chopping onions and carrots for my pasta salad so easy. If you press to much it will mince but you have to learn how many presses you want for desired affect! I love it!!! And for the price you just cant beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Best chopper ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best chopper I have ever used. Quarter an onion, give it 4 SHORT pulses and the onion is perfectly chopped. This is the first chopper ever that took care of celery without strange string bits. Very easy to set up and clean. 4cup size is wonderful for making larger meals. Users that end up with pulp are probably holding the button down too long. Just push and immediately release the button -- a fraction of a second, 4 times or so. Have already purchased another one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: The most used appliance in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd identical chopper that I’m buying over the years, but only because I use it almost every day. I can’t imagine cooking without it. Clean up is a breeze, just rinse it off under the faucet, done.
customer_reviews.author: DeeZee

customer_reviews.title: Too loud and not durable.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint...it's so loud! But it does chop. I have to use my bigger food processor if I want to hide the veggies from my kids. This doesn't chop them fine enough. EDIT...I purchased this in March 2013. It has worked well up until today August 2017. I put one slice of fresh bread in it to make bread crumbs and the plastic holding the blades came apart. Pieces of plastic in the food. Disappointed. Wish things were built to last these days. This processor wasn't used regularly.
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: Thin plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a curious item...the top part doesn't lock (which is simply odd, but not something that gets in the way of use). My mother's complaint (this was a gift) was that the bottom portion is a very flimsy plastic...usually Oster cups are a hard plastic, but this one is rather thin, so be careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this item more stars, I would. I love, love, love my Oster chopper. I've never had a food processor before, and I'm shocked at how often I'm using this. It chops beautifully and quickly, and clean up is a breeze. The materials used are very high quality. I don't do a lot of reviewing, but I was compelled to review this chopper because I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Stitchingmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pork BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Great chopper. I use this chopper to make pork BBQ and it has plenty of power. If you want to chop and not puree, which this will do if your not careful, push and let go of the chopper. I haven't found anything it wont chop and it has a large capacity. From one food lover to another, it's well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: I love this. The blade comes out so you don't ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The blade comes out so you don't have to scoop your chopped stuff out around a hole liike alot of choppers.Small footprint takes up little counter space.Just the right size for the amt of things i cho. My mini chopper was to small for 2 onions,my food processor too big. This is just right and what a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Connie S.

customer_reviews.title: Big Things Come In Small Packages!
customer_reviews.text: As a bachelor this ideal for me! I don't NEED a large food processor, this does the job quite nicely. I've seen other reviews that say this might do the job TOO well! Not so. You just need to learn how to use it properly. For instance I have yet to use it by holding the activator button down for any amount of time because it WILL work too good if you do. I just use the pulse mode of tapping it several times to get just the right amount of chopping done. Always remember 'less is more!'
customer_reviews.author: M. Laurie

customer_reviews.title: it did not work I guess it was bad luck.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother; I sent it overseas, and it never worked. I thought she did not know how to use it, but I visited her last month and I tried to use it to chop some vegetables, but it was dead, it did not work I guess it was bad luck.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: works great and is cheap
customer_reviews.text: we got an Oster BVCB07-Z blender and while it possibly could have done the job of this product, it was worth getting a dedicated chopper. between that blender and this item we still spent a fraction of many of the combo units out there. be aware that this thing holds a lot. capacity is a little large but it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jared M.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: As we have joined the movement to grow more of our own food and prepare our own meals instead of eating take out all the time. We have found this a useful devise to help process medium amounts of food for more complex dishes. I will report on the durability of the unit in the future.
customer_reviews.author: sndmn

customer_reviews.title: Worked well... until it stopped
customer_reviews.text: This chopper worked well until it stopped working tonight. We only had it for about 3 months and used it very lightly - we only used it to make salsa a few times. Then tonight, when we went to use it to chop some garlic, there was no sign of life. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: MissMeowtastic

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I thought it would be. This product has a tendency to leave big pieces along the outer rim and turning the stuff in the middle to mush so fast. Not really great for presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love this for making salsas and soups and what not
customer_reviews.text: Love this for making salsas and soups and what not. I give it 4 stars instead of 5 because it's not really a chopper, like advertised. But not really a food processor either, just an awesome medium. Like I said, great for salsas and soup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Chops fine and coarse -just be sure to keep checking the piece size by chopping in very short bursts. Who needs expensive and hard to clean when this great product is available.
customer_reviews.author: frances

product_meta.title: Oster Top Chop 4-Cup Chopper
product_meta.description: Make quick work of everyday food-prepping tasks in the kitchen with the help of the Oster TOP CHOP 4-Cup Chopper. Equipped with a powerful 250-watt motor;this suprisingly strong chopper offers a large 4-cup capacity work bowl with built-in measuring scale and razor sharp stainless steel chopping blades;allowing you to chop;shred;and grind with ease. An easy press 'n pulse button provides ultimate control;so you can achieve better;more precise chopping results. Chop vegetables & herbs neatly with no mess;shred soft cheese in seconds;or grind hard nuts with no effort. The stylish metallic red finish will look great on your counter-top;and dishwasher-safe parts make clean-up a snap.
feature_bullets: Large 4-cup capacity chopping bowl with built-in measuring scale
Easy press 'n pulse button for better; more precise results
Chop, shred or grind your food in seconds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars326 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
